changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `vika_control_setting` ( `id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '主键', `control_id` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '资源控制标识', `props` json NOT NULL DEFAULT ('{}') COMMENT '选项参数', `created_by` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建者', `updated_by` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '最后修改者', `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间', `updated_at` timestamp NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE, UNIQUE KEY `uk_control_id` (`control_id`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT='工作台-权限控制单元设置表';
